headline: Procter & Gamble (PG) Valuation Check As First Jejurikar Earnings Call Approaches
summary: Recent attention on Procter & Gamble (PG) is building ahead of the January 22 earnings call, the first under new CEO Shailesh Jejurikar. Investors are weighing cautious consumer demand, competition, input costs, and currency moves. See our latest analysis for Procter & Gamble. Despite options traders leaning bullish and P&G being framed as a core defensive holding in recent commentary, the share price has slipped recently. The 90 day share price return is 7.15%, and the 1 year total...

headline: Analysts See Uncertainty Around Coty Inc. (COTY)
